name: Emoji Bubble Bump
description:
[Game introduction]
This emoji bubble is a leisure game, our goal is to make more colors more bubbles together, go to click to eliminate them, one-time to eliminate the bubbles, the more you can get more points and games achievement, also can produce all kinds of game props, these props, have strong ability, quick to game experience this fun game!

[Game Features]
1, a huge number of levels, each level is unique.
2. Random emoji bubbles drop every few seconds.
3, eliminate bubbles, get props, with props to a large area to eliminate bubbles.
4, bubble hoarding over the finish line, then the game failed, need to start again.
